entries.name: Computer assisted anaesthetic dosage according to pharmacokinetic algorithms
entries.description: This modified approach ensures an optimal use of anaesthetic agents taking into account the individual needs of each patient.

entries.name: Simulation of endotracheal intubation
entries.description: These days, the intubation simulators are lacking interactivity. The aim of this study is to elaborate a modified simulator which will be as close as possible to real conditions.
